ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Shri Adwait Pariwar Foundation regd., a voluntary organization formed in 2009, is a collective organizational medium to serve humanity in all possible ways. SAP Foundation regularly organizes distribution of aids and appliances for person with disabilities and, disability awareness programmes to make people aware about disabilities its causes, early intervention, facilities provide by the Government. Foundation, since its inception, has put its marked efforts in girl child education, education for , women empowerment, domestic violence, underprivileged groups, health, sanitation, and environmental issues. We have also laid down foundation of an Old age home in district Bagpat, U.P. In a short period of time, our work has been recognized by Uttar Pradesh Government with state level appreciation as Utkrisht Sanstha i.e. outstanding organization, in 2014. The Foundation, believes in an unified comprehensive approach i.e. Adwait approach with all its strength in a cohesive, scientific and resultoriented approach to serve society. We are now recognized by R.C.I., N.I.O.S., and member of National Trust, Ministry of H.R.D., and Government of India. Activity Community Awareness Programmes are regularly organized by SAP Foundation in different areas of Ghaziabad District. Spandan, An annual sports event, is being organized at NCR level by SAP Foundation every year. Here special children can express themselves freely in front of others, understand competition and team work and rejoice the feeling of being able to live to the fullest. 3rd NCR level Special Sports Meet SPANDAN was organized by SAP foundation on 1819 February 2016 at Ideal Institute, Ghaziabad. SAP Foundation organized one day workshop on, Need of Educational Professionals and Employment Opportunities in Disability Sector, at B.S. Farm Nandgram. FIFA and Special Olympic Bharat organized one day workshop on football for hope and football for social change for persons with disability. SAP Foundation in collaboration with Special Olympic Bharat organized State Floor Hockey ion Camp at Ghaziabad. District Employment Exchange Model Career Center of Ghaziabad, Govt. of U.P., in association with Shri Adwait Pariwar foundation organized Job Fair for Divyang Candidates on 28th Oct. 2016 at District Employment Office, 150 persons with disability were enrolled for this job fair. A total of 53 physically challenged persons were ed in this job fair. Awarness Rallies SAP Foundation organized awareness rally on Save Environment Swachchta Abhiyan from Adwait Public School via Siddique Nagar, Vikas Nagar, G.T. Road. Another rally on digital payment cashless money from Meerut Road, Raj Nagar Extension, DPS School Ghaziabad. Personality Development: SaurabhShobhit Sikshan Prashikshan Kendra is an unit of Shri Adwait Pariwar Foundation which runs special courses of D.Ed. ,in MR and ASD. The Adwait Public School, Ghaziabad is managed by SAP Foundation since 2010 an initiative to bring change in lives of special kids. The school is registred with Disability Act 1995 for education up to class VIII. For class IX to XII, the school is affiliated to National Institute of Open Schooling ,An Autonomus body under Ministry of Human Resource and Development, Government of India.
